Plot: A year with one platoon in the deadliest valley in Afghanistan.
Title: Restrepo
Actors: The Men of Battle Company 2nd of the 503rd Infantry Regiment 173rd Airborne Brigade Combat Team, Juan 'Doc Restrepo, Dan Kearney, LaMonta Caldwell
tomatoConsensus: Forsaking narrative structure for pure visceral power, Restrepo plunges viewers into the experiences of soldiers on the front lines of the Afghan War.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 18 nominations.
